$description.$value: Compact width behavior - buttons hug their content with horizontal layout. Note: Not supported in Figma - use button.container component variants instead.

flex_direction.$description: CSS flex-direction for horizontal button layout. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.

align_items.$description: CSS align-items for horizontal button alignment. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.

justify_content.$description: CSS justify-content for button positioning. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.

gap.$description: CSS gap between buttons in compact layout

button_width.$description: CSS width for buttons - auto lets them hug content. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.
